resources.string: My, my, who's this? A hero? A legend?! Come to visit my humble little Medleyfaire? I'm charmed, honored, truly delighted to meet you!
Food and drinks, get your food and drinks! Don't be shy, this banquet won't eat itself!
Kebabs, caviar, and that weird shimmering drink Claudia concocted! It's all here, and all fresh!
Keep on dancing, yeah, keep on dancing! We'll keep on playing, all night long!
Everybody having fun? Do I need to play LOUDER?
This is so much better than stuffy court music. Hah!
Wondering how to mount a fish? Don't worry, it gets easier and less smelly every year.
Just bring your catch, and a special Ether Concoction to help preserve it. You can buy the ether with Summer Tokens.
Okay! We have seeds to plant, pots to water, stems to trim, vases to clean… It never seems to end!
Okay! We have seeds to plant, pots to water, stems to trim, vases to clean… It never seems to end!
These flowers are looking like they'll be able to sit for awhile without me, so… Yes! I shall attend the Medleyfaire!
The island is so alive here! What a joy! Thank you friend, for allowing me to attend!
Oh! Pardon me, I didn't see you waiting. Do you… are you interested in a cake? Or a fruit tart? If not, t-that's all right.
Oh! Pardon me, I didn't see you waiting. Do you… are you interested in a cake? Or a fruit tart? If not, t-that's all right.
I sincerely hope my dance skills are up to par for the Medleyfaire Maestro. See you at the Medleyfaire!
Am I doing it right? The dancing? I-I hope I'm not making a fool of myself.
Ah, let me guess. It's that time of year, the Master of Ceremonies "forgot" to find a proper carpenter, and they sent you to sweet-talk me.
Oh, don't look so surprised. It's the same story every year.
Ah, let me guess. It's that time of year, the Master of Ceremonies "forgot" to find a proper carpenter, and they sent you to sweet-talk me.
Oh, don't look so surprised. It's the same story every year.
You attached those vices like a true professional.I'll see you at the Medleyfaire!
Well, the stage doesn't look like it will collapse, and the Medleyfaire Maestro has invited me to dance. So, dance I shall!
Oh, the despair! Fresh heartbreak, how it stings! The clouds have swallowed the light of the stars, and never again shall they shine on this poor soul!
Oh, the despair! Fresh heartbreak, how it stings! The clouds have swallowed the light of the stars, and never again shall they shine on this poor soul!
I have never seen such grace, such beauty! I am moved to tears, and I simply must see more of your dancing once I get to the Medleyfaire.
Jubilation and greetings, my inspiring friend! Come, come, come! Dance for me once more so I might be inspired anew!
Shoo, begone, you foul buzzing demons! Oh no, I'm so sorry, I didn't mean you. Now I've gone and insulted a perfect stranger…
Shoo, begone, you foul buzzing demons! Oh no, I'm so sorry, I didn't mean you. Now I've gone and insulted a perfect stranger…
Thankfully, the Maudlinbugs tend to be out in the wilds while I get to enjoy the shelter of the Medleyfaire.I shall buy you a drink once we're there!
I don't know… do you think the bees are doing well in my absence? I think it would be all right if I stayed for one more dance. Okay, let's go!
A Warm Medleyfaire Welcome
Welcome to Summer Medleyfaire! Interact with the Summer Deposit Boxes and collect the instruments placed around the Summer Village.
My, my, who's this? A hero? A legend?! Come to visit my humble little Medleyfaire? I'm charmed, honored, truly delighted to meet you!
"This doesn't look humble to me."
Tsk, such flattery! We're going to be fast friends, you and I. But where are my manners?
I'll be your Master of Ceremonies during this joyous time. Music, fishing, dancing, feasting--you'll find my Summer Villages full of revelry!
"You throw parties all over?"
Oh, of course! I've expanded festivities to Everfall, Monarch's Bluffs, Brightwood, and Weaver's Fen for your celebratory convenience!
Find an instrument, any instrument, and help me fill the air with music!
Come one, come all, to the Summer Medleyfaire! Ah, dear friend, are you still without an instrument? Don't be shy, select any you wish!
Yes, now you're ready to revel! I've always loved music, but the magic of the island breathes fresh life into my tunes.
Especially this time of year, when the Aeternum Sturgeon returns to our shores.
Maudlinbug Haze
Travel to a Maudlinbug Swarmand perform the Maudlinbug Haze with a guitar equipped to collect Maudlinbug Bait and Maudlindust.
Now, I speak of no humdrum fish. The Aeternum Sturgeon is the fairest creature in the sea, and fortune favors any who catch one.
But first, you'll need a fat, adorable little Maudlinbug for bait.
"Maudlinbug? What an odd name."
Why, I devised it! I thought it fitting for the little, glittery creatures.
Eh, some of my guests find their constant droning tiresome, but the bugs have their uses. Their dust for decorations, their bodies for sturgeon bait.
"That's convenient."
Oh, isn't it? As though the seasons themselves wish us to make merry! I'll teach you a little tune of my own creation.
Maudlinbugs find it irresistable. Then once they're swarming, snap! You can gather Maudlinbugs to your heart's content.
You needn't worry about staying in tempo or on pitch. It's really the festive spirit that counts! Oh, and do be careful of the Maudlindust. It tends to cling to one's clothes…
Oh, and do be careful of the Maudlindust. It tends to cling to one's clothes…
Let's see. Maudlindust, bags of bait, and… hmm… festive spirit. My dear friend, you are finally ready for the main event!
Angling for the largest, fairest, most impressive fish in all creation: the Aeternum Sturgeon!
Sturgeon Song
Catch an Aeternum Sturgeon in any open water source using Maudlinbugs as bait. Locate Aeternum Sturgeon Fishing Hotspotsfor an extra angling boost!
I must warn you; the Aeternum Sturgeon may be the finest fish you've ever caught, but they can be a bit challenging.
And of course, you won't be the only angler seeking to land a prize.
"What do you do with all the fish?"
Oh, don't bring the fish to me, heavens no! I'm an appalling chef.
But Claudia and Kartik are magnificent culinarians, and two of my favorite people. They've really outdone themselves with this year's feast.
"So they'll cook up my catches?"
Exactly! Beyond the thrill of the catch, our chefs will reward you handsomely for each sturgeon you bring back.
My dear, how about catching three sturgeons for our chefs to get started?
Aren't you hungry? Remember, three Aeternum Sturgeon, and they won’t bite unless you bait them with Maudlinbugs.
Oh, such magnificent specimens almost look too lovely to eat!
Now, if you feel the same way, Tanaka Jin should be around here somewhere. He'll help our anglers mount catches for display.
Stagecraft
Mend the Carpenter's Bench for Susanne Weber to join the Medleyfaire.
Hmm… something's still amiss. And the sorry state of the dance floor won't do at all! Oh, what to do, whom to invite?
"You keep an invite list?"
Not precisely. Everyone on the island is welcome to my revels! But in my eagerness, I may have, ahem, overlooked some practicalities to keep the festival running smoothly.
So first, we'll need a carpenter! One so skilled that wood trembles in her presence.
"You have someone in mind?"
Susanne Weber! She has a charming little workshop in the wilds.
The stage can only take so much exuberant dancing, and having Susanne on-hand would spare us embarrassments. Or serious injuries. Please don't ask me how I know.
Susanne may take a tiny little bit of convincing. She finds me overwhelming, can you imagine?! But not to worry, dear {playerName}, I have the utmost confidence in you!
Huzzah! I should send you to fetch Susanne every year! Poor dear spends all her time with her nose to the grindstone…
All work and no play makes Aeternum a dull place.
Flower Power
Water Flowers for Bak Ye-Jun to join the Medleyfaire.
Next, we'll need a splash of color. No such thing as too many flowers, and I know just the person.
Bak Ye-Jun. She's new to the island, so she may not have heard of our little party yet.
"She will once she hears you."
That's the spirit! Ye-Jun lives by herself, where the flowers grow aplenty.
When we first met, she told me that she wishes to spend her eternal life brightening up the land with endless fields of flowers.
"A difficult task."
Oh, you think so? To me, it's an exquisite sentiment. Life always needs more color, especially when one lives forever.
When you find Ye-Jun, ask her to bring some of her best bouquets!
We need an injection of life and color, and quick! Don't fail me now, my dear friend!
Oh, flowers and dancing simply belong together, don't you think?
I should ask Ye-Jun if I can set up a stage near her flower fields next year. Carefully, I assure you!
Bees in Bonnets
Tend to Disturbed Apiraries for Luis Morales to join the Medleyfaire.
If you don’t mind meeting someone new, I have an old friend who always worries me this time of year. All furrowed brows and thunderclouds, that one.
"Uh oh…"
Oh dear, I didn't mean to give you the wrong impression! His name is Luis Morales, and he's the sweetest man I've ever met.
A fine apiarist, and a bear on the dance floor if you catch my meaning.
"I… do. I think?"
Marvelous! Now, you may find Luis a touch… perturbed by the Maudlinbug swarms disturbing his beehives.
If there's anything you can do to put a smile back on his face, I would be forever grateful. One must cherish one's oldest friends.
Luis and I met when he built his very first apiary. Oh, I can still remember the sunshine filtering through the first bottle of honey mead.
It was unwise of us to drink the whole damn thing, but it was so worth it.
Ah, Luis, my dear old friend. Look at the smile on his face. What's life without a little fun, hmm? Hogwash, I say.
Sweet Treats
Now that we have honey, we need a baker who knows what to do with it.
Mischa Balchunas and her sweet, summery pastries… my mouth waters just thinking about it!
Clean the Baking Ovens so Mischa Balchunas can join the Medleyfaire.
"Sounds like you know everyone."
You could say it's a life goal of mine, and now I have eternity to do it. But I digress.
Mischa rarely peeks her head out of her shell. Still, I can't bear the thought of leaving her alone while we revel.
"She may not like parties."
And if that is indeed the case, you and I shall never trouble her again. But I would consider it unacceptable to not extend an invitation.
Mischa should be among her clay ovens. Her pride and joy, those are.
Mmm, Mischa's lemon bars are simply transcendent. With how rare sugar and lemons are, I can only imagine the lengths she goes to get them!
The sweet smell of lemons and sugar fills the air. And you even convinced Mischa to do a bit of dancing?
You are a revelation, a natural at the art of merrymaking!
Magnum Opus
Dance to give inspiration to Blaise Thomas to join the Medleyfaire.
If you'll indulge me, my dear friend, I have one final guest on my mind.
Have you ever read any verse by Blaise Thomas? Others may demur, but I consider him the poet laureate of Aeternum!
"That's very high praise."
Yes! In fact, I own a personalized collection of his works! But when I wrote him and begged him to grace our little Medleyfaire, his response was… disheartening.
"He said no?"
Far worse! He claimed he was swearing off poetry forever!
I know what it's like to lose one's creative spark. 'Tis a deep well of coldest melancholy, and I hoped you could free him from it.
I know it may sound daunting. But if anybody can convince Blaise Thomas to join in our festivities and take up the quill once more…it's you.
Is that a page of verse from Blaise? May I see? Well, it's certainly… exuberant!
And that is all I ask of any of my beloved guests. Some good cheer, and a heart open to joy.
Spreading the Cheer
Play music at various locations to advertise the Summer Medleyfaire.
The dance floor is bursting, the food and drink are flowing, and the music never stops!
I daresay, this is the finest Medleyfaire I've ever hosted, and I owe so much of it to you.
"Is there anything else I can do?"
Well, I must confess something, dear friend. I have a dream, you see. Of the entire island ringing with song.
Of the very streets, the cliffs, the rivers of Aeternum alive with laughter and joy!
"That sounds like a tall order."
With music in your soul, nothing is impossible! Take your instrument, and go forth!
Let the hills of Aeternum ring with your sound! Bring as many people as you can, from far and wide.
Someday… my Medleyfaire shall grow and encompass the whole of this isle. But until that lovely dream comes true, I will need your help, {playerName}.
And to think, not so long ago, you didn't even own an instrument!
You, my dear {playerName}, are truly a Maestro in your own right. Next Medleyfaire, I shall compose a grander duet in your honor!
Welcome one, welcome all, to the Summer Medleyfaire! This year is a complete triumph, thanks to you!
Collect Azoth Flute in Summer Village
Collect Guitar in Summer Village
Collect Upright Bass in Summer Village
Collect Drums in Summer Village
Collect Mandolin in Summer Village
Return instruments to Master of Ceremonies
Play 'Maudlinbug Haze'
Travel to the nearest Maudlinbug Swarm
Open the Guitarist's Cache and learn the Maudlinbug Haze's Two Pages
Use Maudlinbug Bait to catch Aeternum Sturgeon in any open water source or Aeternum Sturgeon Fishing Hotspot
Use Maudlinbug Bait to catch a second Aeternum Sturgeon
Use Maudlinbug Bait to catch a third and final Aeternum Sturgeon
Talk to Susanne Weber
Repair Carpentry Bench with green wood from your inventory
Talk to Bak Ye-Jun
Water Sunflowers with water from your inventory
Water Hibiscus with water from your inventory
Water Daisies with water from your inventory
Talk to Luis Morales
Smoke the Apiary
Talk to Mischa Balchunas
Clean the Baking Oven with water from your inventory
Talk to Blaise Thomas
Dance in front of Blaise Thomas to inspire him
Play 'My New Home' (Novice) anywhere in Aeternum
Play 'My New Home' (Novice) anywhere in Aeternum
Play 'My New Home' (Novice) anywhere in Aeternum
Go to the mapped location near Windsward Settlement road
Go to the mapped location near Everfall Settlement road
Go to the mapped location near Brightwood Settlement road
Open Map (M) to search for Maudlinbug Swarm
Choose a location:
Craft the Bee Smoker recipe at your Camp
Go to a Medleyfaire Village
"How can I help?"
Well, I need a full-time assistant. But I can see you're not volunteering for that.
You know, if you could give my flowers some water, I might be able to slip away to the Medleyfaire.
"You're invited to Medleyfaire."
The… Medleyfaire? But there are so many people there! And I… I have cleaning to do.
But you asked so kindly, I feel awful saying no. If… if you help me clean, maybe I could come?
"Ah. I'm sorry."
Don't apologize, you just had the unluckiest timing. My carpenter's bench is in need of repair.
Tell you what, traveler. Help me fix it, and I'll consider it payment for my services at the Summer Medleyfaire.
"I… don't know what to say."
Oh, stranger, please inspire me! I am listless, without purpose or flow in my works.
Do something beautiful! Show me how you would dance at the Summer Medleyfaire.
"It's okay. I'm here to help."
Really? Then I hope you aren't frightened of bees.
Mine are normally quite gentle, but these damn Maudlinbugs get the bees all riled up. A little smoke should fix it.
